New Records: Nikola Jokic was a rebound shy of a triple-double for the second straight night.
Key Match Events: Nikola Jokic scored 18 of his 27 points in the third quarter
Jokic hit a hook shot, a 14-foot jumper and a trio of 3-pointers to give them a 24-point lead heading into the fourth
Pre-Game Insights: Denver guard Jamal Murray is in concussion protocol after taking a blow to his head in the Nuggets’ loss Friday, and Russell Westbrook got his first start of the season in place of Murray
Post-Match Reflections: The Jazz remain the only winless team in the NBA
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Nuggets, who led most of the way, went ahead by 17 on Strawther’s 3-pointer with 1:04 left in the first quarter
Utah cut the deficit to 11 heading into the second and then used a 16-3 run to tie the score at 42 with 7:45 left in the half
Others: The Nuggets started to pull away in the third
Jokic was 3-for-4 from behind the arc in the period
